application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition nos. 3a and 3b (Submission of details - (a) a method statement for the works of removal and reforming of the ceiling dome and associated decorative plasterwork at ground floor level; and (b) section drawings showing the internal profile of the new ceiling dome at ground floor level.) of listed building consent 23/08166 (Extension of Superbrands Womenswear retail space on level 01; removal of non-original retail fit outs; creating openings within structural walls for access; lowering of slab level for accessibility; internal fitting out of level 01 to create 5 new brand spaces and including WC facilities.)
